white: A marmalade baby just out of the womb.
A sip off of what has to be whisky.
The grossest looking humanoid in the world.
A jilted lover's I-Didn't-Love-Him-Anyway sort of mood.
Feathery bird sweat and oily discharge.
The delicate button of an atomic bomb.
The slobbering smacking jowls of Roast Beefyweefs.
A comment or two so deft I cannot even start to reproduce them here.
A wreath of tambourine just lightly jangled.
A second self of tears to hug.
Irking out a few husky hellos.
A fine morning's fire to take the edge off.
The flesh and the blood of the now.
Hardcastle McCormick's hokey points awards show.
Putting on a lucky headband and popping his/her knuckles.
The satanic desire to win at any cost.
Igniting the house in a demonstrative fireball.
A van whose destination is being reconsidered.
A ketchupy callous of a face.
A new pillow to cry into.
Kicking back a few cold ones.
A demon long dead with nothing left to lose.
A rose given as an insincere apology.
Flying over and chomping the fingers off his/her opponents.
A thespian in a particularly juicy role.
A move that mixes martial arts with rainbow magic.
A wily stag of a twig.
Not vomiting from the intense vertigo.
A dying loved one calling out to you for help when you are restrained.
A cloak with a cloaking device.
Pretty much the quintessential evil person.
The shadows of God knows what dimension.
Struggles and losses and pursuits and beheadings.
A music that describes a nocturnal heavenly Yes.
A shimmery pool of unicorn urine.
A candle wax stump of a head.
The most beautiful woman ever around.
A music of brotherhood and balls.
Birds from every breed and fashion.
A super-sized portion of God's freak-show creations.
An orb plucked from under Midas's tunic.
A world laced with rivers of wizardly blood.
A boating accident in shark-infested waters.
A kite of chromosomes blowing on the wind of inheritance.
Crashing in the faces of werewolves and bigfoots with an enormous telescope.
The shit these kids are dealing with in their free time.
The horrible hoary hammer of the gods.
Dancing and shaking a bow and arrow around a ceremonial fire.
Those strappy skirts that were popular back then.
That black hole of a woman.
Preparing breakfast totally magic-free and labor-intensive.
A piano made of frozen Windex.
The social grace of a saint.
The clarity made from mankind's bulbs.
A glass of wine or something.
A flute that was designed by Jesus Christ.
Little hyenas that have come upon a dead family of zebras.
The terminal beauty of being a wizard.
Shaping and massaging of notey syllables.
Spells that even mountains could hardly weather.
Ripping the air a new one.
Dictating the North American weather patterns.
A few bottles of red wine.
A vast volume of loin product.
The smallest frontal lobe in existence.
A sweater made out of a dragon's hide.
Yet another link in life's impenetrably-armored succession of days.
Using his/her voracious mouth as a catcher.
